title: 9-year-old girl accidentally shot by younger brother
content:
SHREVEPORT, La -
A scary rush to the hospital for one family--- after a 9-year-old girl was accidentally shot.
It happened just after one p-m--- on Green Road in Claiborne.
The girl was rushed to LSU Health --- with her family following close behind.
The Claiborne Parish Sheriff's Office says she was shot by her younger brother.
A detective is working on the investigation.
At this time--- the girl's condition is unknown.
